data.message:
Most of these new artists just disappoint. I'm getting tired of the style where half of their songs they're spending more time talking about how great they are at rapping, but then spending so little time actually showcasing or proving the skill they're talking about.

If you listen to the legends of hip hop they do not do this. Sure they may plug themselves here and there, but the vast majority of their mic time is spent making their point and getting their message across with precision and innovation.

Whereas most guys these days just spent most of their time stroking themselves throughout the verse. Like yeah, ok, you're changing the game, you're the "new" this or that guy. Ok, yep, uh-huh.
